long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:


One-click snapshot of thousands of startups in Southeast Asia

The Alternatives extension is a must-have for anyone involved in the startup ecosystem. A single click while you are visiting a company’s website instantly displays key information about that company, such as its total funding, amount of its last raise and the date, revenue growth, founders and their LinkedIn URL and the 3 largest investors. Subscribers can then click to go directly to the full data on the company in Alternatives. 

This powerful extension is light, fast, and really easy to use. 

Who is it for?

• Private Market Investors - VC, PE, IB, Incubators, Angel Networks, Family Offices
• Large Corporates - M&A, Innovation and Digital Transformation teams
• Government Agencies, Industry Bodies and Universities


About Alternatives:

Alternatives is the leading source of financial data for startups in Southeast Asia. Most of the VC funds in Southeast Asia are subscribers. Unlike other data providers, Alternatives connects to the government company registries in Southeast Asia to get every regulatory filing for every startup, every day. So its information is accurate and up to date. Data includes valuation and share prices for each round, precise funding information, details of exits, financials for startups (and for many their latest full audited financials), information on thousands of investors into startups, emails for all founders, directors and investors, and VC fund performance. 

To explore the full potential of the Alternatives platform, visit www.alternatives.pe
